programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: O lendário herói Sartana é chamado para investigar uma série de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequências surpreendentes.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Uma Última Vez, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer é um dentista solitário na Flórida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notícias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantásticas e também desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Experimentos Macabros, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Um homem e uma mulher acordam após uma cirurgia em um sanatório abandonado, sem nenhuma lembrança de quem são ou de como chegaram lá.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: O Ataque dos Tubarões, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Grandes tubarões brancos atacam um barco de pesca que se encontra a quilômetros da costa, obrigando os membros da tripulação a lutarem por suas vidas.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memórias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templários.

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Strategic Air Command, (1955, War)
programme.desc: Aviation and sports come together as a baseball player is recalled to Air Force duty.

programme.title: The Pride of the Yankees, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (1967, Comedy)

programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: King Creole, (1958, Musical)

programme.title: G.I. Blues, (1970, Musical)

programme.desc: His mother (Angela Lansbury) expects him to climb the corporate ladder. But Elvis would rather wear an aloha shirt than a white collar, so he goes to work as a tour guide. Lucky Elvis: his first customers are a car full of cuties.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Platoon, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: The film probes the psyche of the young soldiers who fought in Vietnam. Their camaraderie, their struggle for survival amid terrifying violence and madness of combat.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Studio 666, (2022, Horror)

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Horror)

programme.title: Leprechaun, (1993, Horror)

programme.title: Leprechaun 2, (1995, Horror)

programme.title: Leprechaun 3, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: A leprechaun intent on retrieving his pot of gold terrorizes Las Vegas.

programme.title: Leprechaun 4: In Space, (2004, Horror)
programme.desc: On a planet in a distant galaxy, a power hungry Leprechaun holds a beautiful alien princess hostage in order to marry her for her royal title and his beloved gold, he'll be able to rule the universe.

programme.title: May, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.

programme.title: The Gathering, (2002, Horror)

programme.title: Leprechaun, (1993, Horror)

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends finally land in Egypt, where DIO awaits, and are cutting through the desert when a helicopter approaches. The helicopter belongs to the Speedwagon Foundation and is there to make a special delivery requested by Joseph.
programme.sub-title: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 2
programme.desc: Jotaro and crew acquire the help of Iggy but are ambushed by a water Stand. With Kakyoin injured, Avdol tries out a stratagem which the unseen enemy quickly sees through. Meanwhile, Iggy is napping.
programme.sub-title: Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Khnum's Zenyatta and Thoth's Mondatta
programme.desc: After the battle with N'doul, Kakyoin and Avdol are badly hurt, so the group heads for a hospital in Aswan. Unfortunately, dangerous enemies could be all around them even there.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Anubis, Part 1
programme.desc: A young man named Chaka finds a mysterious sword on the beach. Though other men try, Chaka is the only one who can draw it. The sword claims Chaka as its master and sends the youth in pursuit of Jotaro and his friends with deadly intent.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Anubis, Part 2
programme.desc: Having defeated the "Anubis" Stand user Chaka, Polnareff pays a visit to a barber. But when the barber starts attacking him with Chaka's sword, the Frenchman realizes the sword itself is the Stand user.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bast's Mariah, Part 1
programme.desc: On the way to Luxor, Joseph notices an electrical outlet set in a rock. Fascinated by the rare sight, Joseph goes in for a closer look and gets shocked. Though he seems fine afterward, soon all manner of small accidents begin to occur around him.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bast's Mariah, Part 2
programme.desc: Due to the powers of an enemy Stand, Joseph's body becomes magnetized. While chasing after the woman he suspects is the Stand user, Joseph learns that Avdol has also become magnetized from touching a different electrical outlet.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 1
programme.desc: With Joseph and Avdol busy fighting Mariah, Jotaro and Polnareff get concerned about why they haven't shown up yet. As the two search Luxor, Polnareff senses someone following them and confronts the man.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 2
programme.desc: The power of Alessi's Stand "Set" has turned Polnareff back into a child, leaving him confused and alone. A passerby named Marena takes the boy into her home to help him, but they are followed by Alessi and his terrible powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 1
programme.desc: After a long journey, Jotaro and his friends finally reach Cairo. They begin asking about the location of DIO's palace and find one man who says he has information, but will only answer if the group can beat him in a game.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika's desire to destroy the Phantom Troupe gets him recruited into a newly formed team of assassins.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika heads to the auction site to confirm the death of the Phantom Troupe's leader for himself.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Chrollo tries to discover Kurapika's whereabouts by using readily available information on Neon.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Phantom Troupe finds out that Kurapika is the one who killed Uvogin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika has captured Chrollo and negotiates an exchange for Gon and Killua with Pakunoda.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The auction for the game Greed Island finally begins.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua join the tryouts to become Greed Island players.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit

programme.desc: A remake of George Mihalka's 1981 classic slasher film, MY BLOODY VALENTINE takes place ten years after a devastating coal mining accident when a string of gruesome murders plagues a town.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Running Scared, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar.

programme.title: Real Men, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A secret agent finds himself on the riskiest – and craziest – mission of his career. But when he’s forced to take on a mild-mannered insurance agent as his partner, his already peculiar mission suddenly turns extra dangerous...and extraterrestrial!

programme.title: Throw Momma From the Train, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this black-Comedy spin-off of Alfred Hitchcock's STRANGERS ON A TRAIN, a writing student tries to persuade his instructor to trade murders.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, (1989, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: It was murder! The blind guy couldn't see it. The deaf guy couldn't hear it. But now they're both wanted for it in the drop-dead comedy that reunites the outrageous comedy duo Richard Pryor and Gene Wilder. Rating: R

programme.title: Something Wild, (1986, Dramedy)
programme.desc: A conservative executive accepts a ride with a wild, eccentric woman, who takes him on an outrageous odyssey that turns both their worlds upside down.

programme.title: We're No Angels, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: There's something funny about those two new priests. In fact, there's something downright hilarious. Because Robert De Niro and Sean Penn aren't clergymen at all.

programme.title: Married to the Mob, (1988, Crime)
programme.desc: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed--if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

programme.title: Teen Wolf, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teenage boy's incredible werewolf powers improve the quality of his life in dramatic and hilarious ways.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted “one of the 10 funniest movies ever made” by the American Film Institute, “Airplane!” is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Gambit, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Harry Deane (Colin Firth) is a man with a plan. Art Curator for media tycoon, Lord Lionel Shabandar (Alan Rickman), Harry devises an elaborate plot to con his abusive boss into purchasing a fake Monet painting.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)

programme.title: Sabrina, (1995, Romance)

programme.title: Shikamaru, Ino and Choji come to the rescue. The three have been sent by Tsunade to assist, allowing Naruto and Pakkun to go after Mizuki.

programme.title: The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him!

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Crime)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Eighth Grade, (2018, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school—the end of her thus far disastrous eighth grade year—before she begins high school.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Kevin Smith's most personal film to date, a teenage cinephile tries to woo the girl of his dreams while dealing with a hilarious mix of friends and enemies at his local cinema.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Kevin Smith's most personal film to date, a teenage cinephile tries to woo the girl of his dreams while dealing with a hilarious mix of friends and enemies at his local cinema.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all, destroyes the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: No Escape, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Freejack, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.title: Supernova, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: "Supernova" chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a deep space medical ship and its six-member crew.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Hackers, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A neophyte hacker becomes the target of the FBI after he unknowingly taps into a high-tech embezzling scheme which could cause a horrific environmental disaster in this suspenseful drama.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: A Bridge Too Far, (1977, War)
programme.desc: With an all-star cast that includes Sean Connery, Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Olivier, Gene Hackman and Robert Redford, this epic WW II drama recreates Operation Market Garden, an ambitious plan to hasten the end of WW II that ended in disaster.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: 1898, Alaska: John Thornton and his partner, Pete, make deliveries to mining outposts using a sled-dog team led by Buck, a prized sled dog that is targeted by crooked prospectors. Over time, Buck is increasingly drawn to life in the wild.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror)
programme.desc: Supposed true story about the Lutzm family whose dream house turns into a nightmare. The unsuspecting new tenants of a house whose previous occupants had been murdered in their sleep.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 1
programme.desc: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 2
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 1
programme.desc: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hard Knox
programme.desc: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rule Duel
programme.desc: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus
programme.desc: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Doom in Bloom
programme.desc: Shark’s sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rivals in the Ring
programme.desc: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma’s Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Friendship Games
programme.desc: When Yuma’s buddies can’t stop bickering, it’s time for them to face-off in the Friendship Games, a sports dueling competition with surprises around every corner… including Barians!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 1
programme.desc: A dangerous new Barian enemy arrives, and he’s bringing one of his world’s most powerful weapons to take down Yuma and Astral!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 2
programme.desc: Mizar batters Yuma to his breaking point… until a surprise duelist steps in to take down Mizar and go claw-to-claw with his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Playing Defense
programme.desc: In order to set Yuma straight, Shark steals Yuma’s Key! Can Yuma find the courage to face Shark, or will Yuma’s fears leave him cowering for cover?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Counter Offensive: Part 1
programme.desc: Let’s get ready to duuuuuuuuel! Yuma steps into the ring with Alito, but can he dodge this Barian’s Battlin’ Boxers before they send him to the canvas for a ten count?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Counter Offensive: Part 2
programme.desc: It’s Round 2 of the heavyweight battle between Yuma and Alito! Can Yuma bob and weave his way around Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian’s fancy footwork finish him off for good?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Dual Duel: Part 1
programme.desc: Girag’s got revenge on his mind and Ray in his sights, but when Yuma steps in to save the day, the Ray Way steers Yuma off course!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Dual Duel: Part 2
programme.desc: Girag has Yuma and Ray in the palm of his hand, but will a secret that Ray has been keeping help our heroes escape the clutches of this Barian behemoth?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Darkness Dawns
programme.desc: Astral and Yuma face a challenge so daunting that they must turn to their biggest adversary for help!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: You Give Love A Bot Name
programme.desc: When Orbital 7 crashes into Lillybot, it’s love at first sensor! So when he discovers his beloved bot is in trouble, he motors to free her from her tormentor… Yuma!
programme.sub-title: You Give Love A Bot Name

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Take a Chance
programme.desc: Shark’s trying to control Rio’s life and she’s not taking it anymore! Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother’s winning streak on ice?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1
programme.desc: The gang’s dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school’s fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2
programme.desc: Being Anna’s boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna’s teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Enter Vector
programme.desc: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Search for Shadows
programme.desc: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

programme.title: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ALL-OUT SPECIAL POWER BATTLE!! GUM-GUM VS. SNAKE-SNAKE

programme.title: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HANCOCK'S CONFESSION-- THE SISTERS' ABHORRENT PAST

programme.title: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVING ACE! THE NEXT STOP: THE GREAT PRISON

programme.title: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOVE IS A HURRICANE! LOVE-LOVE HANCOCK

programme.title: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE SCIENCE OF WEATHER AND THE MECHANICAL ISLAND

programme.title: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! AN ISLAND OF GIANT BIRDS AND A PINK PARADISE!

programme.title: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! BRIDGING THE ISLANDS AND VICIOUS VEGETATION!

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DANGEROUS ENCOUNTER! BLACKBEARD AND SHIRYU OF THE RAIN!

programme.title: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say – heads will roll!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REFUSAL TO BE DEFEATED! SERIOUS HANNYABAL

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land barron and his hired gun.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: War, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A full-throttle, martial arts thriller, WAR stars Jet Li and Jason Statham as two adversaries set on a violent collision course in the Asian mob underground.

programme.title: The Way of the Gun, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Continuing his crusade to punish violent criminals in America, former FBI agent Frank Castle arrives in New York to take on a scarred villain who plots to take control of the underworld.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Wataru’s Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagi’s attention.
programme.sub-title: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each other’s secret identities.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.
programme.sub-title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.
programme.sub-title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.
programme.sub-title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.

programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.

programme.desc: Complications arise after buddies (Jennifer Westfeldt, Adam Scott) agree to a have baby but remain just pals.

programme.desc: Journalist Fred Flarsky unexpectedly reconnects with Charlotte Field -- his former baby sitter and childhood crush. When Charlotte makes a run for the presidency, she impulsively hires Fred as her speechwriter -- much to the dismay of her advisers.

programme.desc: Complications arise after buddies (Jennifer Westfeldt, Adam Scott) agree to a have baby but remain just pals.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: After losing her job and her boyfriend, a woman moves in with her estranged mother and finds an assortment of strange characters inhabiting the home.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Ameaça Explosiva, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Depois de uma ameaça de bomba, dois especialistas do FBI mergulham em um jogo mortal de gato e rato com um criminoso, correndo desesperadamente contra o tempo para descobrir o verdadeiro objetivo do homem-bomba, enquanto lutam para salvar sua cidade. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Adam Joseph Copeland, C.j. Perry, Erica Carroll, Julia Benson, Michael Rogers, Mitchell Kummen, Patrick Sabongui Diretor: Stephen Reynolds

programme.title: Sobreviva a Noite, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Um intenso filme de ação, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacável e seus mercenários em um vilarejo italiano. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Dolph Lundgren, Hal Yamanouchi, Natalie Burn, Ralph Palka, Mario Opinato, Brice Martinet, Andrea Scarduzio Diretor: Giorgio Bruno

programme.title: O Júri, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Um membro do júri une forças com um "consultor" que tenta manipular o resultado do julgamento. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: John Cusack, Gene Hackman, Dustin Hoffman, Rachel Weisz, Bruce Davison, Bruce McGill, Jeremy Piven, Nick Searcy, Stanley Anderson, Cliff Curtis Diretor: Gary Fleder

programme.title: Sentinela, (2006)

Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Michael Douglas, Kiefer Sutherland, Eva Longoria, Kim Basinger, Martin Donovan, Blair Brown, Kristin Lehman, Raynor Scheine, Ritchie Coster, David Rasche Diretor: Clark Johnson

programme.title: Aposta Máxima, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai à Costa Rica enfrentar magnata. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Justin Timberlake, Gemma Arterton, Anthony Mackie, Christian George, Yul Vazquez, Ben Affleck, Michael Esper, Oliver Cooper, John Heard, James Molina Diretor: Brad Furman

programme.title: O Preço do Amanhã, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas é acusado de assassinato e foge com um refém que talvez possa quebrar o sistema. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Justin Timberlake, Olivia Wilde, Shyloh Oostwald, Johnny Galecki, Colin McGurk Diretor: Andrew Niccol

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança! Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem Diretor: Pierre Morel

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991)

Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jet Li, Biao Yuen, Rosamund Kwan, Jacky Cheung, Kent Cheng, Kam-Fai Yuen, Shi-Kwan Yen, Shun Lau, Wu Ma, Jianguo Qiu Diretor: Hark Tsui

programme.title: Linha de Ação, (2013)

Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

Um professor de astronomia da NASA faz a terrível descoberta de que um asteroide destruidor está em rota de colisão com a Terra e precisará proteger sua família enquanto alerta o mundo sobre a iminente devastação. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Tom Berenger, Bernard Curry, Brooke Langton, Caitlyn Carver, Lew Temple Diretor: Rex Piano

programme.title: Anjos da Noite, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen Diretor: Len Wiseman

programme.title: Piranha 2, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. No passado, uma feição geológica nas profundezas da água despertou uma pira que estava extinta há milhões de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terríveis animais invadem um parque aquático no meio da temporada de verão. programme.title: Vulcão - O Apocalipse, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Quando um ex-comandante das Operações Especiais visita Pompéia, sua esposa e filha ficam presas no Monte. O Vesúvio entra em erupção com força maciça. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: John Rhys-Davies, Adrian Paul Diretor: Ben Demaree

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Susan Sarandon, Hugh Grant Diretor: Tom Tywe, Lana Wachowski

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011)

Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz. Gêneros: Horror Elenco: Brooke Hogan, Carmen Electra, Charlie O'Connell, Christina Bach Norman, Cornne Nobili, David Gallegos Diretor: Christopher Douglas-Olen Ray

O líder da expedição esconde dos colegas que veio aqui para encontrar o pai, desaparecido há muitos anos. Bailey, Luca Zingaretti, Luca Barbareschi, Christian Kohlund, Elen... Diretor: Roger Young (Director)

programme.title: A Pequena Sereia, (2018)
programme.desc: 2018. Jornalista faz uma reportagem sobre um circo que diz apresentar uma sereia de verdade. Inicialmente cético, ele leva sua jovem sobrinha na viagem e lá eles descobrem uma bela e encantadora criatura. Junto eles planejam libertá-la. Gêneros: Children & Family Elenco: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta Diretor: Blake Harris, Chris Bouchard (co-director)

programme.title: Chihuahua O Filme, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Uma mulher mal-humorada e recentemente divorciada é forçada a repensar suas prioridades quando acorda no corpo de uma adorável Chihuahua chamada Bella visitando crianças doentes em um hospital onde ela (ele) é um cão de terapia. Gêneros: Children & Family Elenco: Anya Benton, Jason Ellefson Diretor: Michael Amundsen

programme.title: Arlo: o Porquinho Travesso, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Sem amigos em sua nova escola, uma jovem faz amizade com Arlo, um porquinho que fugiu do circo. Mas os arrotos altos de Arlo significam que ele não será um segredo por muito tempo e, juntos, eles aprenderão o verdadeiro significado do amor e da amizade! Gêneros: Children & Family Elenco: Drake Bell, Joey Lawrence, Jennifer Taylor Diretor: Tom DeNucci

programme.title: Shelby, (2020)

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa, (1970)

Chernomor, o malvado feiticeiro, rouba Mila diante dos olhos de Ruslan para transformar seu poder de amor em seu próprio poder mágico. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970)

programme.title: A Gangue Zip Zap, (1970)

programme.title: O Doutor da Felicidade, (1970)

programme.title: Apostando Alto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Assim que Ella conhece Abel, sua vida, até então regrada, muda. Com esse amante que ela não consegue decifrar bem, a jovem descobre a Paris cosmopolita e subterrânea dos círculos do jogo, onde a adrenalina e o dinheiro reinam. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Corrida Selvagem, (1970)

programme.title: O Imperador, (1970)

programme.title: Cordeiros e Carrascos, (1970)

programme.title: Sem Rastros, (1970)

programme.title: Uma Beleza Fantástica, (1970)

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968)
programme.desc: 1968. Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer.
